title: Duo Silver and Ranked Flex Gold... Will i still get the "skin" reward for gold player?
body: Well let say i'm silver for solo/duo and for flex im gold will i still get those gold reward? (Skin reward)

replies.body: Nothing's been announced yet for end of season rewards, and I don't have anymore information until that happens.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for any updates, but grats on your prowess so far!

They actually did mention at the start of the season that people who got gold in *either* solo/duo or flex would be eligible for this seasons victorious skin (with an extra undisclosed reward for those who managed gold+ in both).

edit: [source](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season)
